messages.message: In UAT, the link for “Learn more about Converse” does not point to the new docs site. It should point to http://aihub.instabase.com/docs/aihub/converse/#how-to-ask-converse-great-questions . I feel like these keep coming up as one-offs, but all links that go out to docs should be changed to aihub.instabase.com/docs/aihub/ (http://aihub.instabase.com/docs/aihub/)… rather than aihub.instabase.com/hub/docs/ (http://aihub.instabase.com/hub/docs/)….

We really should invest in a shortlinks service that allows us to make such changes without code changes too. IT is working on golinks for internal use but it won't help for these external facing links.
btw the change is already in aihub-sandbox and picked back into 23.39 release
